description:
This is a frozen dessert.
 Kwality Wall's Cadbury Crackle Tub is a delightful frozen dessert featuring creamy vanilla ice cream swirled with Cadbury Dairy Milk chocolate and crispy rice crispies. Indulge in the smooth texture of vanilla ice cream complemented by the rich and crunchy Cadbury chocolate pieces that provide a satisfying texture and burst of flavor. Perfect for chocolate lovers looking for a delicious treat with a mix of creamy and crispy elements. Whether enjoyed as a dessert on its own or shared with others, Kwality Wall's Cadbury Crackle Tub promises a delightful and indulgent experience with every scoop.
product.ingredients: Dessert : Water, Chocolate Confectionery (14.6%) [Water, Sugar, Condensed milk, Milk Chocolate, Liquid Glucose, Cocoa Solids, Palm Oil, Milk Solids, Maltodextrin, Emulsifier (E471), Stabilizers (E412, E410). [Contains permitted natural colour - e150d and synthetic food colours - e122, e133, e102 and added artificial vanilla flavouring substance.], Sugar, Chocolate Coated Butterscotch Confectionery (10.1%)Outer Layer (Milk Chocolate): Cadbury Dairy Milk (Sugar, Milk Solids, Cocoa Butter, Cocoa Solids, Emulsifiers (E442, E476). Contains added flavour (natural, nature identical and artificial (vanilla) flavouring substances)Allergen information: Contains Milk, Cocoa Butter, Glazing Agent (E904), Stabilizers (E1400, E414), Emulsifier (E476) & Preservative (E202), Inner Layer (Butterscotch Confectionery): Sugar, Salted Butter, Cashew Nuts, Iodised Salt], Palm Oil, Milk Solids, Liquid Glucose, Cocoa Solids, Emulsifier (E471), Vegetable Protein (Soy), Stabilisers - E412, E410, E407. Contains Permitted Natural Colour - e150d and Synthetic food colours - e122, e102, e133 and Added flavour - Nature identical (chocolate) and Artificial (vanilla & milk) flavouring substances. Contains 10.2% Edible vegetable oil and Vegetable protein products.

description: Savor the exquisite blend of flavors with Cream Bell's Black Forest Ice Cream Cake, a decadent creation that combines layers of creamy vanilla and chocolate ice cream with decadent chocolate cake pieces. Swirled throughout are tart cherries and a hint of cherry sauce, all coated in a rich chocolate ganache. Perfect for any celebration or indulgent moment, this cake offers a harmonious balance of sweetness and tartness, delivering a delightful twist on the classic Black Forest cake in a frozen dessert form.

description: Indulge in the irresistible richness of Creambell's Double Chocolate Ice Cream Cake, a decadent dessert that blends layers of velvety chocolate ice cream with chocolate cake. Each bite offers a symphony of flavors and textures, combining creamy ice cream with moist cake, all enveloped in a luscious chocolate coating. Perfect for celebrations or a special treat, this cake delivers pure chocolate bliss in every slice, making it a delightful choice for chocolate enthusiasts and dessert lovers alike.
product.name: Cream Bell Double Chocolate Ice Cream Cake

description: Indulge in Mama Mia's Blueberry Cheesecake Ice Cream, a delightful fusion of creamy cheesecake-flavored ice cream swirled with luscious blueberry sauce. Each spoonful offers a perfect balance of tangy sweetness from the blueberries and rich, velvety smoothness from the cheesecake base. It's a heavenly treat that captures the essence of a classic dessert in a refreshing frozen form. Ideal for satisfying dessert cravings with a twist, straight from your freezer to elevate any moment with its gourmet taste.
product.name: Mama Mia Blueberry Cheesecake Ice Cream

description: Introducing the Baskin Robbins Very Berry Strawberry Ice Cream Tub, where creamy vanilla ice cream meets the vibrant sweetness of real strawberries. Indulge in a luscious blend that perfectly balances rich creaminess with the natural fruitiness of strawberries. Each scoop delivers a refreshing burst of flavor, making it a delightful treat for strawberry lovers and ice cream enthusiasts alike. Enjoy the essence of summer in every spoonful with Baskin Robbins Very Berry Strawberry Ice Cream Tub, perfect for sharing or savoring solo.

description: Elevate your dessert experience with Cream Bell's Caramel Crunch Ice Cream Cake, a decadent creation that layers creamy vanilla and caramel-flavored ice cream with indulgent caramel sauce and crunchy caramelized nuts. description: Indulge in the delightful combination of flavors with Baskin Robbins' Honey Nut Crunch Ice Cream Tub. Each spoonful offers a perfect balance of sweetness from the honey and the satisfying crunch of nuts, creating a luxurious texture and delightful flavor experience. Ideal for sharing or savoring solo, Baskin Robbins' Honey Nut Crunch Ice Cream Tub promises a deliciously satisfying treat that will leave you craving more.
